#How to use neoeedit on linux

= Introduction =

make a script


= Details =

Command line usage:
  * change to root(because need to write file to /usr/bin) use "su"
  * $ java -jar neoeedit.jar
  * edit the page like:
{{{
#!/bin/sh
java -Xmx1024M -jar /home/xxx/Downloads/neoeedit.jar $1 &
}}}
  * press ctrl-s to save it to /usr/bin/neoeedit.sh
  * close neoeedit
  * $ chmod +x /usr/bin/neoeedit.sh
  * now use can use neoeedit.sh your-file on command line or select it on GUI.
